price: সিহঁতে ক’লে, ‘বৰং আমি আমাৰ পিতৃপুৰুষসকলক পাইছোঁ, তেওঁলোকে এনেকুৱাই কৰিছিল’।
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
